content.question: The ratification of the United States Constitution despite the “resistance” described in the excerpt is best understood in the context of which of the following developments?

choices.label: The threat to the neutral trading rights of the United States
The persistence of regional cultures in the new United States
The agreement by some state delegates to pursue a Bill of Rights
The mistrust of centralized authority by some Anti-Federalist politicians

content.answer: The agreement by some state delegates to pursue a Bill of Rights

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
